name: 2GB Storage
description: Store more patient charts by upgrading your storage capacity.
longDescription: Expand your digital medical cabinet as your clinic serves more patients each day. One (1) GB storage is approximately 1,000 patient profiles with regular photo attachments.

name: Registration
description: Patient profiling, queuing & appointments.
longDescription:
Features:
  • Patient Profiling
  • Medical Records
  • Configurations
  • Multi-branch search
  • Full Clinic Queuing
  • Appointments
  • Registration Kiosk
  • Queue Board Display

name: Registration
description: Create printable Prescriptions, Charts, Lab Orders and more.
longDescription:
Features:
  • Digital Prescriptions
  • Charts & Encounters
  • Diagnostic Orders & Results
  • Custom Medical Forms
  • Records Printing
  • Specialty Features

name: Billing
description: Manage patient billing, doctor rebates, and HMO receivables.
longDescription:
Features:
  • Collection & Receivables
  • Transactions
  • Invoice Printing
  • Doctors' Commission
  • HMO/Corporate Transaction
  • Management
  • AP & AR Aging Reports

name: Pharmacy
description: Point-of-Sales functions, Rx access, inventory management and reports.
longDescription:
Features:
  • Point of Sales Functions
  • Digital Prescription Access
  • Inventory Management
  • Real-time Sales Report

name: Materials Management
description: Items masterlist, reorder & expiration alerts, weekly reports.
longDescription:
Features:
  • Items Masterlist
  • Purchase Orders & Stock Requisitions
  • Reorder Point & Item Expiration Alerts
  • Multi-branch Distribution
  • HMO/Periodical Inventory Reports

name: Laboratory
description: Online & printable lab results, census, HL7 machine  integration.
longDescription:
Features:
  • Extraction Queuing
  • Custom Lab Result Templates
  • Online & Printable Results
  • HL7 Machine Integration
  • Laboratory Census

name: Imaging
description: Online & printable imaging results, census, DICOM/PACS integration.
longDescription:
Features:
  • Imaging Queuing
  • Custom Imaging Result Templates
  • DICOM/PACS Integration
  • Online & Printable Results
  • Imaging Census

name: Physical Medical Exam
description: Auto-balancing queues, PME reports, group registration.
longDescription:
Features:
  • Auto-balancing Queue Algorithm
  • PME Results Consolidation
  • Customizable Report Templates
  • Group Registration (for Corporate/HMO packages)
  • Group Progress Monitoring

name: Cloud Storage
description: Added monthly subscription for every additional 1GB (or 1,000 patients) stored per month.

name: Users
description: Added monthly subscription for every additional user account being utilized per month.

name: Syncbase
description: Use MYCURE even if your internet connection is down.

name: Clinic Setup & Installation
description: On-site clinic setup & technical installation
longDescription:
Clinic Setup and Installation is designed for new clinics using MYCURE Clinic Management System for the first time. With the help of an Implementation Manager, you will receive technical setup and assistance to configure MYCURE system according to your business rules and process flow structures.

    This service may include, but is not limited to
  • An assigned Implementation Manager for the first 2 months from the start of your MYCURE subscription
  • Assistance with the technical setup associated with MYCURE Clinic Management System
  • Refining your business process flows to adapt to the MYCURE system standards
  • Advice and guidance on transitioning or complementing your existing systems with MYCURE

name: Project-based Consulting
description: A one-time consultation session with our experts to help you optimize MYCURE system in your clinic
longDescription:
Sometimes we need a little extra help with the nitty-gritties of clinic process automations. Work with MYCURE Specialists and Process Engineers to help find the best strategies to integrate MYCURE technology into your clinic operations.

Activities 2-hour session 4-hour session 8-hour session
Business Process Discussions✔️✔️✔️
Technical Discussions✔️✔️✔️
Comprehensive Patient Journey Flows️✔️✔️
End-user feedback discussions️✔️
Ocular visit and Technical Inspection️✔️
Price $89.99 $179.99 $199.99

name: On-site Training
description: A comprehensive 8-hour training day for all key MYCURE users in your clinic
longDescription:
Get all your staff members engaged with the clinic system transition! With an 8-hour training day led by MYCURE Trainers, you can shorten the learning curve of your staff in understanding the MYCURE system and how it marries with their clinic roles and responsibilities.

    What’s included:
  • MYCURE System Orientation
  • Features Training per User Role
  • Basic and Complex Use Cases
  • Patient Journey Simulation
  • Guided Quizzes for Users
  • Open Forum

name: Remote Training
description: A 2-hour one-on-one tutorial session via Skype on a specific module of your choice
longDescription:
Get your Skype app ready for a remote training program for MYCURE. This is a useful onboarding service to help you and your staff quickly learn the different modules of the app:

    2-hour Training Modules available:
  • Registration (for Front Desk Staff)
  • Medical Records (for Physicians)
  • Administrative (for Clinic Owners and Admin)
  • Billing (for Cashier and Billing Staff)
  • Pharmacy & Materials Management
  • Laboratory
  • Imaging
  • Physical Medical Exam
    Why do clinic owners prefer remote training?
  • Staff members can self-learn the system and would only need minimal assistance
  • Clinic is outside Metro Manila or CALABARZON area
  • Has good internet connection (at least 10 Mbps)
